Frontend Framework	Shiny (R) 
Backend API	Plumber (R) 
Database (optional)	Firebase, PostgreSQL, or Google Sheets
Hosting	ShinyApps.io, AWS, DigitalOcean


inst/shiny_app/app.R	Main Shiny app file combining UI and server.
inst/shiny_app/ui.R	Defines the user interface for instructors.
inst/shiny_app/server.R	Handles server logic for optimization and manual adjustments.



tests/testthat/test-import_data.R	Tests if survey data is correctly loaded.
tests/testthat/test-optimization_model.R	Validates group formation constraints.
tests/testthat/test-manual_adjustments.R	Ensures manual changes are saved correctly.
.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md	Template for bug reports.
.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md	Template for feature requests.


vignettes/	Provides long-form documentation in .Rmd format.
man/	Stores .Rd documentation files (generated by roxygen2).
docs/	Contains pkgdown-generated website for documentation.
